Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the assessment of excess wear and damage to a leased motor vehicle upon termination of the lease
Summary: Requires holders of motor vehicle leases to make any repairs or replace any items for which a lessee is charged upon termination of the lease prior to selling the vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง343, Pers Prop L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the personal property law, in relation to the assessment of excess wear and damage to a leased motor vehicle upon termination of the lease
